description.en: handle.fi is a decentralised multi currency stablecoin protocol which allows users to create and exchange multi-currency stablecoins; called fxTokens. fxTokens are collateral backed stablecoins representing, and soft pegged to, a range of currencies. users create fxTokens by depositing eligible collateral and minting stablecoins secured by this collateral.
